entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Methods with both stackalloc and loops bypass tiering #85548
  • JIT fails to merge trivial blocks after jump threading #85547
  • Support more date-time formats for JSON deserialization #85545
  • Regression in JsonPlatform due to AVX-512 changes #85543
  • Analyzer/Code fix idea: JsonConverters applied to properties implementing a collection #85540
  • [API Proposal]: add MethodInvoker for fast invoke APIs #85539
    8.0.0
  • Investigate including the SPMI collector as part of the core runtime #85537
  • Microbenchmarks where inliner runs out of budget with TieredPGO #85531
    8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Linux-arm64 llvmfullaot build fails with missing libclang-9.so.1 #85529
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to help keep nullable annotations clean and efficient #85527
  • Analyzer: Recommend upgrading to CompositeFormat for enhanced performance #85525
  • Analyzer: Report use of untestable time-related features #85524
  • JIT: suboptimal codegen for isinst + cast pattern #85522
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console logs an unnecessary Message node in a Scopes node #85514
    Future
  • JIT does not promote Span<T> in R2R code #85511
    8.0.0
  • Missing workloads on Linux #85505

Closed

  • Loop representation, EH, and dominators, on x86 #84222
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Activator API to create a type from a possibly non-public parameterless constructor #85541
  • XUnit log fixer creates invalid XML when fixing the xml after a timed out test #84940
    8.0.0
  • Test failures not reported in test run #85056
    8.0.0
  • createdump is added to Mac app bundles #83613
    8.0.0
  • The JSON value of length n is too large and not supported #2 #39953
    Future
  • Make ParameterBuilder abstract #83831
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.ReceiveMessageFrom_SpanSyncForceNonBlocking.ReceiveSent_UDP_Success test timed out #85535
  • LNK2038 mismatch detected in NativeAOT #85517
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableArray.CreateUnsafe<T>(T[] array) #83141
    8.0.0
  • HelloWorld console app build failed on ppc64le with .NET8 Preview3 #84771
    8.0.0
  • Children of a custom Layout control are not displayed in Design view #85515
  • Force AOT tooling to preserve a generic type to avoid MakeGenericType fails for scripting libraries. #85208
  • cannot build native oat in visual studio code #85325
  • ReversePInvoke transition should be no-op in `DoNotTriggerGc` region on NativeAOT #85377
    8.0.0
  • how can I run runtime tests with monovm on ios? #85160
    8.0.0
  • Transparently serialize collections with custom JsonConverter #85479
  • Various WASM timeouts on CI #85304
    8.0.0
  • [HttpStress] massive timeouts around HTTP/3 stress test startup #77126
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm.Build.Tests] Could not restore Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest #85456
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Make the RefreshMemoryLimit API public #85549
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: one phi arg per pred #85546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `OBJ(LCL_ADDR)` args handling from local morph ref counting #85544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] es6 test main #85542
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup some xarch emit logic #85536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Make optAssertionPropGlobal_RelOp less conservative for side-effects #85532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [browser] Load appSettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` faster encoding for change case. #85516
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Delete `arrayArgumentsFound` logic from type loader #85509
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete more type equivalence logic #85507
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Emission and reading of custom modifiers #85504
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the CodeGen::genCodeForIncSaturate(). #85502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Improve block unrolling, enable AVX-512 #85501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Fix volatility checks in VN and loop side effects code #85467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enhance SSA checker to check some PHI properties #85533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix exception leaking from filter in nativeAOT #85366
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make preinitialized delegates reflection-visible #85506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add documentation for merge on red, build analysis, and v1/v2 tests #84982
    documentation, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Skip methods in test-merging if they use the named argument 'Skip' for the Fact attributes #85495
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128.Create on Arm64 for mini JIT #85404
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Assert on unhandled opcodes instead of falling back to t… #85454
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove redundant dictionary lookup in XPathDocument #85534
    area-System.Xml
  • Remove Base64 value length limit from Utf8JsonWriter #85334
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Abstract out ParameterBuilder and implement it #85446
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6 #85418
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce some collection sizes in the System.Collections.Immutable tests. #85508
    area-System.Collections
  • Add ImmutableCollectionsMarshal type and AsImmutableArray/AsArray APIs #85526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add comparison methods #85512
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Invoke AssemblyLoad hooks from RuntimeAssemblyBuilder:.ctor ()… #85307
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use 8.1 atomics, if available, in RhpCheckedXchg/RhpCheckedLockCmpXchg #85283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Allow reverse pinvoke in DoNotTriggerGc thread state regardless of coop mode. #85435
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: ARR_LENGTH(new T[CNS]) --> CNS #85496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests for local aliasing on Mono Interpreter #85250
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Expanding timeouts for long running test projects #85313
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Comment out support for mtag extension in libunwind #85474
    source-build
  • Disable crossgen on riscv64 #85499
    area-Setup, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add better fix for UnhandledExceptionHandlerUnix #85497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [wasm] GenerateWasmBootJson - close file handles #85482
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85423
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.7

Updated

  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Prefer lld in NativeAot when using clang #85478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Docs on testing blazor wasm #85455
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][debugger] Support step over and pause multiple times in same line but different columns #85484
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85143
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable regex to use IndexOf(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) for prefix searching #85438
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of IndexOf(chars, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) #85437
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] ArmBase methods are now intrinsic. #85458
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Refactor deduplication to use enum instead of flags #85384
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85341
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • fix JsonNode deserialising from null #85463
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ignore expiration in NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test #83157
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Localization] String needs improvement #32124
  • GenAPI drops internal ctor which results in compilation errors #32119

Closed

  • Invalid parameter order when adding a project to sln using `dotnet sln add` should be validated #17686
    Backlog
  • GenAPI can generate ambiguous call to base constructor #31655

PullRequests

Created

  • Add debian to the SupportsTargetFramework logic. #32127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove reference to 'BINDING' in 'BlazorHotReload.js' #32121
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Testing updated install scripts #32112
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • dotnet sln: Add error message for misplaced solution argument #18608
    Area-CLI
  • Allow opting-in to NativeAOT publishing using runtime packs #32100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the workloads txt file name to KnownWorkloadManifests.txt. #31949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry-picking the Auth changes to 8.0 branch #32108
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • updated containers docs #31884
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • Enable TestBaseTypeWithAmbiguousNonDefaultConstructorsRegression31655 #32091
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Try out osx 13 to balance out the queue utilization #32102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Try installing wasm-tool from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimized symbol location collections #68020
    Compiler.Next
  • AnalysisMode "Recommended" is misleading #68018

Closed

  • Getting address to a managed `ref` field returns the value of the field, not the address #68000
    17.7
  • Support defining aliases for generic definition types. #68013
  • Checksum's usage of a native hash algorithm resulting in thread starvation #67995
  • Bug using auto-properties in record structs? #68017

PullRequests

Created

  • Check ILegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService is null in GenerateConstructorFromMembersCodeRefactoringProvider #68024
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test scouting queue with the merge #68023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use scouting queue to unblock VS package upgrade #68022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .editorconfig only shows as dirty with changes #68021
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement support for Inline Array conversions #68019
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove redundant hex digit validator from lexer #68016
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Move the SyntaxTree and SemanticModel action based analyzers to respect context.FilterSpan #68014
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Refactoring: Consistently use `Keyword` helper in C# help service #68015
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Use optimized hash creation methods on .NET 5+ #67999
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Incremental Generators documentation fix #68002
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors: address duplicate interceptions feedback, handle nameof, add test coverage #67971
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Cleanup/perf in creating member maps. #67997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create file based on project path if the file path is null in LSP code action handler #68006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Convert bad expressions for error recovery #68011
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation
  • Filter out EnableNullable code actions #68005
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P3
  • Avoid reusing ref receiver temp #67955
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade spa-templates client apps to yaml 2.2 #47975
  • Add JSON Serialize API to support ASP.NET polymorphic serialization #47973
  • Quarantine E2E Component tests related to scrolling within page #47967
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plainTextSansFilter, updates #47965
  • No XML encryptor configured #47959
  • The method that validates the client certificate is not executed #47955
  • I set in the server that a client certificate it is needed, but the server responses when the client doesn't include any client certficate #47952
  • Blazor - Ternary operator crashes #47943

Closed

  • B #47974
  • Randome new issue #47971
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudDeleteProduct #47930
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #47928
  • Perf improvement: json #47946
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #47947
  • IExceptionHandler for exception handler middleware #46280
    8.0-preview5
  • Remove support for "name" attribute for hash routing #47953
    8.0-preview5
  • MapShortCircuit causes runtime exceptions in app published as native AOT #47941
  • ProtectedBrowserStorage can't load more than 25kb #47945
  • Perf regression: https #47865

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Invoke `receiveHotReloadAsync` directly #47964
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • for CI purposes: try on-by-default #47958
    area-runtime
  • Fix DateOnly format for Input Tag Helper #47957
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47950
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47949
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Run helix matrix tests on AlmaLinux 8 #47970
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Quarantine E2E Component tests related to scrolling within page #47968
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove debug check from fabric bot labeling automation #47972
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix the aot search regex #47969
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Fix failing routing tests #47963
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • IExceptionHandler for exception handler middleware #46280 #47923
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d42267c` to `cb12cf5` #47960
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Re-use base project for RDG tests #47936
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview5
  • Run quarantined-pr job on all release branches #47939
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove support for name attribute when hash routing #47954
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a5308bb` to `0bdaac5` #47961
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove unused variable #47931
    area-commandlinetools, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add MapIdentityApi<TUser>() #47927
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-identity, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity
  • [release/6.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.2.3 -> 6.5.0) #47860
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Replace lock with CAS #47751
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using Launcher in .NET MAUI to open a file opens the "share" menu on a Mac #14839
  • Error reading response from wcf service in basicHttpBinding #14836
  • cannot use developer tools to debug blazor hybrid MAUI application in Mac OS #14835
  • Picker SelectedItem set to null on Popup #14832
  • Maui Shell Not Animated Not Working in IOS #14831
  • DisplayActionSheet still not working on Windows #14829
  • [Bug] InputTransparent = false does not work. #14828
  • Webview CaptureAsync .net Maui Desktop #14825
  • Azure DevOps build failure: "The app references non-public selectors in Payload/AppDev.xxx.app/AppDev.xxx: setOrientation:animated: (ID: 701d936c-b52e-4dae-8823-bec4e8848c61)" #14823
  • Cannot debug on iOS as `Loaded Assembly xxxxx` phase takes too long. #14822

Closed

  • CollectionView does not update when changing ItemsLayout #7747
    Backlog
  • SearchHandler does not display more than one suggestion #6293
    Backlog
  • [Android] OnDestroy is currently firing twice #8541
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET MAUI on Android keeps not responding messages #14806

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] AOT profiles for .NET 8 Preview 4 #14838
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] MauiTextView doesn't need ViewAttachedToWindow #14833
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [controls] improve performance of {Binding} #14830
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [net8.0] Merge latest main to net8 #14826
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview

Merged

  • [Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout #14532
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Propagate Navigation Events through PageContainer #14523
  • Add some dummy images to the sandbox #14815
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix some sample XAML so the text wraps #14821
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Avoid OnDestroy lifecycle event firing twice #14799
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Make sure to call `InitializeViewHandler` when creating a handler #14814

Updated

  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Enabling tolerance adjustment in iOS color verification tests #13945
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #14391
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816
  • [Windows] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Housekeeping] Added sample to the Gallery to validate shape invalidations clipping #14798
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF7 json Column - Set Max String Length #30793
  • EF Core generates wrong column name in migration for foreign key column in one to many relationships using PropertyAccessMode.Field configuration #30792
  • InvalidCastException for some types of queries when using an existing SQL Server connection #30788
  • Context.ChangeTracker in EFCore 7 is "losing" added entities #30787
  • Translate SequenceEquals #30786

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30575 - Multiple LeftJoins (GroupJoins) lead to GroupJoin Exception when the same where is used twice #30794
    Servicing-consider
  • Reintroduce the SDK workaround for OSX on Helix #30790
  • [release/7.0] fixing a typo in quirk string for issue 30330 #30784

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview4] Reintroduce the SDK workaround for OSX on Helix #30791
    tell-mode

Updated

  • Allow configuration of the sentinel value that indicates a property has not been set #30760
  • Fix navigation in UserDefinedFunction #30776
  • Work on collection indexer/length normalization #30780

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NetSDKE2E] Missing RPM installer packages for .NET 8 Preview4 SDK on main branch #16228

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview4] Fix building RPMs #16284
    Servicing-consider, Area-Setup
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Install libLLDB 9 #16283
  • Update poison usage baseline #16280
  • Keep deployment-tools package versions in sync (#16270) #16278
  • Fix IDE analyzer errors for aspnetcore (#16268) #16276

Merged

  • preview 4 version of the automatic min-version #16250
  • Update the minimum VS version automatically #16124
  • Create KnownRuntimePack entries for NativeAOT #16261
  • Disable VerifyVersionFile test #16282
  • Fix building RPMs #16249
  • Fix BlazorWasm projects #16260
  • Fix vstest analyzer errors (#16269) #16277
  • Keep deployment-tools package versions in sync #16270
  • Update prebuilts tarball version #16271
  • Fix vstest analyzer errors #16269

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2169741 #16135
